title: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre Directly Download
description:
Take on the role of one of the notorious Slaughter family, or their victims, in The Texas Chain Saw Massacre, a third-person asymmetrical horror experience based on the groundbreaking and iconic 1974 horror film. As a victim you must use your wits and stealth to stay out of the Familyâ€™s reach and find the tools you need to lead to your eventual freedom . BOOK OF HOURS
Slaughter Family players must seek out, track down, and stop their guests from escaping. Players of The Texas Chain Saw Massacre can finally find out if they have what it takes to survive . Experience the mad and macabre for yourself in The Texas Chain Saw Massacre.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i5 6th gen or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
